name: COBANK
sampleDescriptions: Ensuring the continued viability of agriculture export programs and policies to enhance U.S. agriculture programs; support funding, use and reauthorized of USDA export credit guarantee program (S. 3240)
Agriculture export finance, including export credit guarantees; Reauthorization and Extension of the omnibus Farm Bill; Agriculture appropriations; Expanding Agricultural Exports Act (S. 176/H.R 648)

Reauthorization and Extension of the omnibus Farm Bill; Agriculture appropriations, including for rural water, energy, and telecommunications; Agriculture export programs, including export credit guarantees; Rural development

Reauthorization and Extension of the omnibus Farm Bill; Agriculture appropriations; Agriculture export programs, including export credit guarantees; Rural development; Investing in Rural Communities Act (H.R. 4736); Producer and Agricultural Credit Enhancement Act (PACE) Act (S. 2890/H.R. 5631); Farm Credit Administration Independent Authority Act (H.R. 2423) Expanding Agricultural Exports Act (S. 176/H.R 648)
